languages.text: "Если миру грозит серьезная опасность, нам не стоит воевать — давайте найдем управу на нашего врага сообща!"

traits.locale_text: "Если миру грозит серьезная опасность, нам не стоит воевать — давайте найдем управу на нашего врага сообща!"

languages.text: "If this world is in serious danger, there is no sense in fighting each other — let us deal with our common enemy together!"
languages.original_text: "Если миру грозит серьезная опасность, нам не стоит воевать — давайте найдем управу на нашего врага сообща!"

traits.locale_text: "If this world is in serious danger, there is no sense in fighting each other — let us deal with our common enemy together!"
"If this world is in serious danger, there is no sense in fighting each other — let us deal with our common enemy together!"
"If this world is in serious danger, there is no sense in fighting each other — let us deal with our common enemy together!"
"If this world is in serious danger, there is no sense in fighting each other — let us deal with our common enemy together!"

languages.text: “如果这个世界真的处于严重的危机之中，那彼此争斗毫无意义。我们应该一起对付我们共同的敌人！”
languages.original_text: "If this world is in serious danger, there is no sense in fighting each other — let us deal with our common enemy together!"

traits.locale_text: “如果这个世界真的处于严重的危机之中，那彼此争斗毫无意义。我们应该一起对付我们共同的敌人！”

languages.text: 「この世界が深刻な危機にあるというならば、互いに争うことに意味は無い。協力して共通の敵に立ち向かおう！」
languages.original_text: "If this world is in serious danger, there is no sense in fighting each other — let us deal with our common enemy together!"

traits.locale_text: 「この世界が深刻な危機にあるというならば、互いに争うことに意味は無い。協力して共通の敵に立ち向かおう！」

languages.text: "Wenn diese Welt ernsthaft in Gefahr ist, sind Streitigkeiten untereinander sinnlos – lasst uns zusammen gegen unseren gemeinsamen Feind vorgehen!"
languages.original_text: "If this world is in serious danger, there is no sense in fighting each other — let us deal with our common enemy together!"

traits.locale_text: "Wenn diese Welt ernsthaft in Gefahr ist, sind Streitigkeiten untereinander sinnlos – lasst uns zusammen gegen unseren gemeinsamen Feind vorgehen!"

languages.text: « Si ce monde court un grave danger, il serait stupide de se battre entre nous. Mieux vaut nous liguer contre notre ennemi commun ! »
languages.original_text: "If this world is in serious danger, there is no sense in fighting each other — let us deal with our common enemy together!"

traits.locale_text: « Si ce monde court un grave danger, il serait stupide de se battre entre nous. Mieux vaut nous liguer contre notre ennemi commun ! »

languages.text: «Si este mundo corre auténtico peligro, es absurdo que nos enfrentemos entre nosotros. ¡Acabemos juntos con nuestro enemigo común!».
languages.original_text: "If this world is in serious danger, there is no sense in fighting each other — let us deal with our common enemy together!"

traits.locale_text: «Si este mundo corre auténtico peligro, es absurdo que nos enfrentemos entre nosotros. ¡Acabemos juntos con nuestro enemigo común!».

languages.text: "Bu dünya ciddi bir risk altındaysa birbirimizle savaşmak akla, mantığa uymaz... Ortak düşmanımızla birlikte baş edelim!"
languages.original_text: "If this world is in serious danger, there is no sense in fighting each other — let us deal with our common enemy together!"

traits.locale_text: "Bu dünya ciddi bir risk altındaysa birbirimizle savaşmak akla, mantığa uymaz... Ortak düşmanımızla birlikte baş edelim!"
